content.rendered:
Top-rated review app to build stunning social proof that drives growth
No matter what type or size of the store you run, Ali Reviews helps you to collect and display reviews, turns reviews to become the most effective marketing material, and level up your conversion rate. With Ali Reviews, you can:
• Collect Reviews Effectively
Collect reviews directly via different methods including manual & automatic review request emails and SMS, on-site, discount, reminder
• Boost Sales with Nice Widgets
Showcase reviews in beautiful ways using highly-customizable widgets. Display right reviews to right audiences and turn them into customers
• Increase Traffic with Reviews
Push reviews to social channels (Google, Facebook, Twitter & Pinterest) in a click, and drive conversion-ready traffic to your online store

Benefits:

  • Built-in Ali Reviews integration in our themes
  • No manual coding adjustments
  • Automatically adjust the Ali Reviews widget to theme structure
App details Get promotions
